mapper.select: SELECT distinct b.board_no, b.id, b.b_content, b.regist_date, m.m_img_addr, b.b_img1, b.b_img1_addr, b.b_img2, b.b_img2_addr, b.b_img3, b.b_img3_addr, likecnt FROM board b, member m, b_m_like l, (SELECT b.board_no, COUNT(*) likecnt FROM board b, b_m_like l WHERE b.board_no = l.board_no GROUP BY board_no) ml WHERE m.id = b.id AND b.board_no = ml.board_no ORDER BY b.regist_date desc

SELECT b.board_no, b.id, b.b_content, b.regist_date, m.m_img_addr, b.b_img1, b.b_img1_addr, b.b_img2, b.b_img2_addr, b.b_img3, b.b_img3_addr FROM board b, member m WHERE b.id = #{id} and m.id= b.id ORDER BY b.regist_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (id, board_no, com_content) VALUES(#{id},#{board_no},#{com_content})
mapper.select: SELECT r.com_no, r.id, r.board_no, r.com_content, m.m_img_addr FROM reply r, member m WHERE m.id = r.id ORDER BY com_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_m_like ( id, board_no) VALUES( #{id}, #{board_no})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM member WHERE id LIKE '%||#{value}||%'
